title: Sculpture of the Parthenon
creator_credit: Howard Tracy and Hugh Baddeley Productions
brief_description: Provides a comprehensive coverage of the sculpture of the Parthenon. In addition to the remains in Athens, the film covers the full scale replica of the Parthenon at Nashville, Tennessee; the model and exhibits in the Royal Ontario Museum of Toronto, Canada. Suitable for upper secondary level.
